official_title: A bill amending section 104(b)(5)(A) of title 23 of the United States Code.

summary.text: Allows Massachusetts to use apportioned funds for the planning and design of any alternative interstate route which is recommended in a final environmental impact statement submitted by the State in September 1983 and approved by the Secretary of Transportation.

titles.title: A bill amending section 104(b)(5)(A) of title 23 of the United States Code.
